message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something unique and valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you consider that price?
I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $125. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's worth the investment.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $117.50. Can you consider that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can offer it to you for $123. It's the best I can do, but I think it's a fair price considering the value of the product.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you at $120. Can you consider that price?
